page.title: 07SUBURBS OF ABERDEEN.
page.content: Bankhead comprises areas of farmland, residential, and a manufacturing industrial sector.The products made are pipes and paper. Waterton House is a large,old house which has been converted into flats.A railway line passes through this area.There are only a few shops there. Bankhead has a sport's centre & a few outdoor sport's grounds,one hotel & a few B.& B.'s. Most of the area was probably built about 20 to 25 years ago. Near Bankhead is Grandhome.In one of the paper_mill's grounds is a millpond.There is a story about it.It goes like this: There was once a man who sailed around the world.When he came back, he went to the millpond. He toppled in and drowned. Now nobody is allowed near the millpond.
